title: How to Market to Prime Contractors – for Professional & Standard Services Firms and Goods Firms, 12/03/15
desc: Developing targeted marketing strategies is critical to having a successful business, and trying to sell your products or services to Prime Contractors requires the same tactical approach used to reach other clientele. Attend our upcoming workshop and learn how to effectively market your business to the government.
